pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, May 19, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Prayer Breakfast.

Westin Hotel Ottawa
Ballroom
11 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:15 a.m.

The Prime Minister will be in private meetings for the rest of the day.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
